thread.title: How to get the best deal - and pay less tax - on foreign shares
thread.title_full: How to get the best deal - and pay less tax - on foreign shares

author: Ed Monk
title: How to get the best deal - and pay less tax - on foreign shares
text: How to get the best deal – and pay less tax – on foreign shares More British investors are wanting to buy overseas shares in companies like Google. Here's how Google is seen as one of the most exciting investment opportunities on the planet - but how can UK investor get a slice? By Ed Monk , Investment Editor 9:24AM BST 09 Oct 2015
